resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Perhaps, for any relocation, it would be sufficient to substitute the street number... of *** Street instead of: the number 12 of Neuve-Sainte-Geneviève Street.
resource.chars: Perhaps, for any relocation, it would be sufficient to substitute the street number... of *** Street instead of: the number 12 of Neuve-Sainte-Geneviève Street.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: January 2, 1862. In making the final revision, I decide to put everything in the imperfect and past tense on the copy, but I leave the manuscript as it is.
resource.chars: January 2, 1862. In making the final revision, I decide to put everything in the imperfect and past tense on the copy, but I leave the manuscript as it is.

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M264.10069,1689.44546c92.06635,-52.50264 221.94085,-91.59959 352.44472,-91.55288v0v0c130.50387,0.04671 244.19464,36.62127 352.44472,91.55288c108.25009,54.93161 150.32553,138.63677 145.98738,221.02819c-4.33814,82.39142 -55.08986,163.4691 -145.98738,221.02819c-90.89752,57.55909 -221.94085,91.59959 -352.44472,91.55288c-130.50387,-0.04671 -260.46828,-34.18063 -352.44472,-91.55288c-91.97644,-57.37225 -145.96491,-137.98282 -145.98738,-221.02819c-0.02248,-83.04537 53.92103,-168.52555 145.98738,-221.02819z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="ellipse_e8d37ffc-f5f5-4f30-b3f0-3d2022bc6d99" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Keep the manuscript as it is, and in the event that, given the current regime (1860), I deem it necessary to relocate the convent, make this alteration only on the copy. (In case of relocation, transfer the convent to rue de Lourcine or de l'Arbalète.)
resource.chars: Keep the manuscript as it is, and in the event that, given the current regime (1860), I deem it necessary to relocate the convent, make this alteration only on the copy. (In case of relocation, transfer the convent to rue de Lourcine or de l'Arbalète.)

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
Here is an other example, book IV « Le petit Picpus »...
We will need to refer again to the end of the manuscript to find the final text, revised and corrected by Victor Hugo.
resource.chars:
